product_name: Thule Circuit Fork Mount Bike Carrier
long_description: No tools needed; the Thule Circuit Fork bike mount offers up its service to you and your bike in a jiff! Fork mount provides superb security and convenience when transporting your bike. Low-profile, reinforced AeroHead and the D-shape, low-profile aluminum tray deliver a durable, stable platform. Fork mount fits most disc brakes and suspension combinations with standard 9mm axles. Easy-to-use and lockable stainless-steel skewer with an oversize lever provides secure loading and unloading. Using Thule One Key System lock cylinders (lock cores sold separately), lock bike to carrier and carrier to rack. Wheel tray fits tire widths up to 2.6 in. and a wheelbase up to 48 in.; compatible with high-profile rims. Rear ratcheting wheel strap is easy and quick, and holds bike securely to tray. Fits Thule AeroBlade bars, square bars, round bars and most factory racks right out of the box.
short_description: No tools needed; the Thule Circuit Fork bike mount offers up its service to you and your bike in a jiff! Fork mount provides superb security and convenience when transporting your bike.
